title: Glaives
content: Glaives in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Glaives are Two-Handed Martial Weapons in BG3 that boast Extra Reach. They can only be two-handed, dealing 1-10 damage without enchantments. They have a range of 2.5m, and deal Slashing Damage, though some special Glaives also deal another type of Damage as well. Being melee weapons, Glaives scale off of Strength, save for The Dancing Breeze which is a Finesse
